Internet Remarks: Calling all nature lovers! This architectural home in West Vancouver has an incredibly private and peaceful outlook. You may see eagles and owls perched high above the tranquil river which flows below. Salmon which have migrated from the ocean, swim through the upper reaches of the rivers where they spawn on gravel beds, in your back yard! Inside this unique Peter Kaffka designed home, you fill find 4 bedrooms, and 3 baths spread over 2-levels. The kitchen has stainless appliances, a sub zero fridge, an indoor wood fired pizza oven, and a large skylight flooding the space with natural light. The living room has vaulted ceilings, and the master bedroom is sure to impress with a large ensuite, walk in closet, patio, and reading nook. Plenty of outdoor patio space to enjoy the South facing sunlight. Bonus 2 car garage with storage. This 13,000+ sqft property is conveniently within steps to Park Royal Mall, and Ambleside Beach!

Internet Remarks: Experience the Forest House. Located on a private cul-de-sac lot, in the midst of wild forest the property opens widely to Gulf Island water views. This West Coast Modern was built in 1961 by prominent architect Peter Kaffka & is attributed w/ designing some of Canada's most iconic buildings. This updated 4BD, 4BA is elevated on the hillside with large floor-to-ceiling windows, the house appears to be floating in the trees, giving it a feeling of weightlessness. As one of the larger mid-century modern houses at nearly 3,500sqft, this piece of architecture not only satisfies the senses but allows for all the space required by 21st century families.  New roof, new bamboo flooring, new glazing, & many more updates...just bring your design ideas. Forest house is an urban retreat!

Accessible to marine traffic and pleasure crafts, direct ferry or float plane access.
